Api.name: childSemantic
Api.Doc: Marks the given data provider as having a specific semantic.

Child.name: b:dataProvider
Child.doc: Marks the given data provider as having a specific semantic.

Param.name: targetHTMLElementId
Param.Doc: The ID of (!existing) HTML element this widget should be attached to. This is API of a factory! A widget is always created from HTML DOM element.

Param.name: targetHtml
Param.Doc: An existing HTML element this widget should be attached to, provide a dom element, a jQuery element or selector, or an element id.

Api.name: executable
Api.Doc: Can be executed and has a status ready/nonready.

Param.name: id
Param.Doc: Id of the data provider, unique on the page. If omitted the id is automatically generated.

Child.name: b:model
Child.doc: A model loaded from a URL.

Child.name: b:inlineModel
Child.doc: A model which is created from the XML data inside its body.

Child.name: b:modelWrapper
Child.doc: A generated model computed by applying an XSLT transformation chain to a set of models (XML documents).

Child.name: b:ref
Child.doc: A reference to a DataProvider declared elsewhere.

Api.name: dataProvider
Api.Doc: A data provider is an abstract class on top of the AbstractExecutable extending it by data-related functions (like getName, getData, data events).

Child.name: a:dataListener
Child.doc: Add a listener monitoring changes in the XML content of the model

Api.name: hasInputModel
Api.Doc: Works on a main input model.

Param.name: inputModel
Param.Doc: Works on a main input model.

Api.name: transformationChain
Api.Doc: Applies a chain of transformations on a model.

Param.name: chain
Param.Doc: A DataProvider which contains the list of style sheets that make up the transformation chain of this renderer. This DataProvider must contain an XML document satisfying the XML Schema 'chain-1.0.0.xsd'. The 'url' attribute and 'chain' tag are mutually exclusive.

Param.name: stylesheetUrl
Param.Doc: This parameter can be set when you only want to apply one single XSLT style sheet. It contains the URL pointing to it. If this parameter is set no nested 'chain' tag must be provided.

Api.name: chart
Api.Doc: Creates a chart. Requires width/height to explicitely assigned to the target html element either thru inline styling or CSS or defined by meta data model.

Child.name: cmp:config
Child.doc: The model containing the chart configuration data.

Param.name: id
Param.Doc: The chart's id.

Param.name: metaDataModel
Param.Doc: The model containing the chart meta data (see chart-1.0.0.xsd, Root Element 'Chart').

Param.name: config
Param.Doc: The model containing the chart configuration data (see chart-1.0.0.xsd, Root Element 'Chart').

Api.name: chartLegend
Api.Doc: Creates a chart legend.

Child.name: b:inputModel
Child.doc: The DataProvider instance that becomes the input of the chartLegend.

Param.name: chartRendererId
Param.Doc: The chart's renderer id.

Param.name: id
Param.Doc: The chart's legend id.

Api.name: cubeModel
Api.Doc: Creates a cube model, provides data with calculations and col dimensions applied.

Param.name: config
Param.Doc: The model containing the cube configuration data (see cube-2.0.0.xsd, Root Element 'CubeConfiguration'). If it is not present a SimpleModel with the url './cubeConfiguration.xml' is created.

Param.name: metaDataModel
Param.Doc: The model containing the cube meta data (see cube-2.0.0.xsd, Root Element 'CubeConfiguration'). If it is not present a SimpleModel with the url './cubeConfiguration.xml' is created.

Param.name: statusModel
Param.Doc: The model containing the current cube layout together with the filters. This is the guiStatus model by default.

Param.name: requestChain
Param.Doc: An alternative request building chain. Default here is /bcdui/js/component/cube/request.xslt.

Api.name: cube
Api.Doc: Creates a cube front end based on given data or a configuration.

Child.name: cmp:config
Child.doc: The model containing the cube configuration data.

Child.name: cmp:statusModel
Child.doc: The model containing the current cube layout together with the filters.

Api.name: cubeConfigurator
Api.Doc: Creates a cube configurator, providing the cube:Layout section of the cube configuration, able of 1) Showing the drag and drop area for the dimensions and measures 2) Providing templates to the user 3) Allowing the user to save templates for him/herself 4) Allowing the user to create new measues with the formular editor

Child.name: cmp:config
Child.doc: The model containing the cube configurator configuration data.

Examples.Example: bcdui.component.createCubeConfigurator({ id: "cubeConfigurator", , config: bcdui.factory.createModel({ url: "dimensionsAndMeasures.xml" }) , targetHTMLElementId: "cubeConfiguratorDiv" , targetModelId "guiStatus2" , isRanking true , rankingTargetHtmlElementId: "rankingDiv"

Param.name: cubeId
Param.Doc: Id of the cube the configurator belongs to. If not given, the surrounding renderer is assumed to be a cmp:cube.

Param.name: config
Param.Doc: The model containing the cube configuration data (see cube-2.0.0.xsd, Root Element 'CubeConfiguration'). If it is not present a SimpleModel with the url './dimensionsAndMeasures.xml' is created.

Param.name: metaDataModelId
Param.Doc: The model containing the cube meta data (see cube-2.0.0.xsd, Root Element 'CubeConfiguration'). If it is not present a SimpleModel with the url './dimensionsAndMeasures.xml' is created.

Param.name: cubeRenderer
Param.Doc: Id of the cubeRenderer (or the cube instance itself) the configurator belongs to. If not given, the surrounding renderer is assumed to be a cmp:cube.

Param.name: targetModelId
Param.Doc: Per default the configuration is written to $guiStatus/guiStatus:Status/cube:Layout[cubeId='cubeId']. Change this for example if you want to have multiple cubes and multiple cubeConfigurators.

Param.name: isRanking
Param.Doc: Enable the ranking feature. This is an Enterprise Edition only feature.

Param.name: rankingTargetHtmlElementId
Param.Doc: If isRanking is true then this attribute can be used to control the div where the ranking editor is placed.

Param.name: isTemplate
Param.Doc: Enable the template feature. This is an Enterprise Edition only feature.

Param.name: templateTargetHtmlElementId
Param.Doc: If isTemplate is true then this attribute can be used to control the div where the template editor is placed.

Param.name: showSummary
Param.Doc: Enable the summary feature.

Param.name: summaryTargetHtmlElementId
Param.Doc: If showSummary is true then this attribute can be used to control the div where the summary is placed.

Param.name: reportName
Param.Doc: Name of the report is used to access the persistent layouts.

Param.name: hasUserEditRole
Param.Doc: Template Editor also has edit capability. If not given, bcdui.config.clientRights.bcdCubeTemplateEdit is used to determine state (either *(any) or cubeId to enable).

Param.name: expandCollapseCells
Param.Doc: When specified (with 'expand' or 'collapse' or 'collapse2nd'), cube turns on the expand/collapse mode. collapse2nd initially keeps level one open.

Param.name: tooltip
Param.Doc: 'true' brings default tooltip, 'false' no tooltip and any other string is a url to a custom tooltip.

Param.name: contextMenu
Param.Doc: 'true' brings default context menu, 'false' no context menu and any other string is a url to a custom context menu.

Param.name: isDefaultHtmlLayout
Param.Doc: If true, a standard layout for dnd area, ranking, templates and summary is created. Separate targetHTMLElements will be obsolete then. If false, you need to provide containers with classes: bcdCurrentRowDimensionList, bcdCurrentColMeasureList, bcdCurrentColDimensionList, bcdCurrentMeasureList, bcdDimensionList, bcdMeasureList within an outer bcdCubeDndMatrix container. if your targetHtml got classes bcdDndBlindOpen or bcdDndBlindClosed, the actual dnd area is also put in collapsable boxes (either open or closed by default).

Param.name: applyFunction
Param.Doc: Function name which is used for the apply button in isDefaultHtmlLayout=true mode. Default is bcdui.core.lifecycle.applyAction

Param.name: url
Param.Doc: The URL the model for the grouping editor is loaded from. If omitted the WrsServlet is taken as default.

Param.name: doSortOptions
Param.Doc: When setting this to true, dimensions and measures lists are sorted by caption.

Param.name: actionHandler
Param.Doc: Instance (or name) of an action handler class. Requires contextMenuActionHandler property. Default is an instance of bcdui.component.cube.configurator.ActionHandler.

Api.name: farModel
Api.Doc: A FAR model. Can be used as a DataProvider.

Param.name: config
Param.Doc: Required. The model providing component's configuration data.

Param.name: statusModel
Param.Doc: The StatusModel, containing the filters at /SomeRoot/f:Filter

Param.name: componentId
Param.Doc: The componentId, it is a business id (not techincal) i.e. if you have more than one component on a screen you need to provide unique componentId for each of the entity, otherwise the entities will share configuration.

Api.name: far
Api.Doc: This tag creates a far component.

Api.name: scorecardModel
Api.Doc: A scorecard model. Can be used as a DataProvider for renderers.

Param.name: config
Param.Doc: Required. The model providing the scorecard's configuration data.

Param.name: metaDataModel
Param.Doc: Required. The model providing the scorecard's configuration data.

Param.name: customParameterModelId
Param.Doc: Custom parameter for usage in the custom aggregator and aspect transformations.

Api.name: scorecard
Api.Doc: This tag creates a scorecard component.

Param.name: contextMenu
Param.Doc: 'true' brings default context menu, 'false' no context menu and any other string is a url to a custom context menu.

Param.name: actionHandler
Param.Doc: Instance (or name) of an action handler class. Requires contextMenuActionHandler property. Default is an instance of bcdui.component.scorecard.ActionHandler.

Param.name: tooltipUrl
Param.Doc: To overwrite default renderer xslt of the tooltip. An empty string will disable tooltips. Default is BCD-UI's default tooltip.

Api.name: config
Api.Doc: This tag is a DataProvider-Role tag exposing the nested DataProvider as a configuration model. It is typically used in more complex components or widgets to give additional configuration data to the rendering.

Api.name: metaData
Api.Doc: This tag is a DataProvider-Role tag exposing the nested DataProvider as a metaData model. It is typically used in more complex components or widgets to give additional configuration data to the rendering.

Api.name: statusModel
Api.Doc: The statusModel tag is a DataProvider-Role tag passing the nested DataProvider to the enclosing Object as a status model. Normally the guiStatus model represents the standard status model on the client, but in some situations it is useful to provide an alternative status model to a component or widget. Then this tag can be used.

Api.name: gridModel
Api.Doc: Creates a grid model.

Param.name: config
Param.Doc: The model containing the grid configuration data. If it is not present a SimpleModel with the url './gridConfiguration.xml' is created.

Param.name: statusModel
Param.Doc: The model containing the current cube layout together with the filters. This is the guiStatus model by default.

Param.name: saveChain
Param.Doc: A DataProvider which contains the list of style sheets that make up the transformation chain of this renderer. This DataProvider must contain an XML document satisfying the XML Schema 'chain-1.0.0.xsd'. The 'url' attribute and 'chain' tag are mutually exclusive.

Param.name: loadChain
Param.Doc: A DataProvider which contains the list of style sheets that make up the transformation chain of this renderer. This DataProvider must contain an XML document satisfying the XML Schema 'chain-1.0.0.xsd'. The 'url' attribute and 'chain' tag are mutually exclusive.

Param.name: validationChain
Param.Doc: A DataProvider which contains the list of style sheets that make up the transformation chain of this renderer. This DataProvider must contain an XML document satisfying the XML Schema 'chain-1.0.0.xsd'. The 'url' attribute and 'chain' tag are mutually exclusive.

Param.name: requestPostChain
Param.Doc: A DataProvider which contains the list of style sheets that make up the transformation chain of this renderer. This DataProvider must contain an XML document satisfying the XML Schema 'chain-1.0.0.xsd'. The 'url' attribute and 'chain' tag are mutually exclusive.

Param.name: serverSidedPagination
Param.Doc: Set to true if you want to enable server sided pagination.

Param.name: actionHandler
Param.Doc: Instance (or name) of an action handler class. Requires contextMenuActionHandler property. Default is an instance of bcdui.component.grid.ActionHandler.

Api.name: grid
Api.Doc: Creates a grid front end based on given data or a configuration.

Child.name: cmp:inputModel
Child.doc: The DataProvider instance that becomes the input of the transformation chain. If omitted a bcdui:model tag (or a derived) must be present instead.

Child.name: cmp:config
Child.doc: The model containing the grid configuration data.

Child.name: cmp:statusModel
Child.doc: The model containing the current filters.

Param.name: targetHtml
Param.Doc: An existing HTML element this widget should be attached to, provide a dom element, a jQuery element or selector, or an element id.

Param.name: tooltipChain
Param.Doc: To overwrite default tooltip chain. An empty string will disable tooltips, otherwise the default gridTooltip.xslt is used

Param.name: contextMenu
Param.Doc: 'true' brings default context menu, 'false' no context menu and any other string is a url to a custom context menu.

Param.name: customSave
Param.Doc: Custom save function

Param.name: afterAddRow
Param.Doc: Custom function(args) which is called after a row was added (args.rowNode, wrs row node which was added, args.headerMeta wrs header object)

Param.name: allowNewRows
Param.Doc: Allows inserting new rows via default contextMenu or drag/paste

Param.name: columnFilters
Param.Doc: Enable basic column filter input fields

Param.name: maxHeight
Param.Doc: set a maximum vertical size in pixel (only used when no handsontable height is set)

Param.name: isReadOnly
Param.Doc: Turn on viewer-only mode

Param.name: topMode
Param.Doc: add/save/restore buttons appear at the top, pagination at bottom, insert row at top

Param.name: forceAddAtBottom
Param.Doc: Always add a new row at the bottom, no matter if topMode or pagination

Param.name: disableDeepKeyCheck
Param.Doc: Set this to true if you really want to disable the deep key check which is active if your grid is only a subset of the underlying table

Param.name: isReadOnlyCell
Param.Doc: Custom check function if a given cell is read only or not. Function gets gridModel, wrsHeaderMeta, rowId, colId and value as input and returns true if the cell becomes readonly

Param.name: columnFiltersGetCaptionForColumnValue
Param.Doc: Function which is used to determine the caption values for column filters. You need to customize this when you're e.g. using XML data in cells.

Param.name: defaultButtons
Param.Doc: Set to false if you want to hide the default buttons reset/delete/save.

Param.name: paginationSize
Param.Doc: Set pagination page size (and enable pagination).

Param.name: paginationAllPages
Param.Doc: Set pagination show all option (and enable pagination).

Api.name: tree
Api.Doc: Creates a tree front end based on configuration.

Child.name: cmp:config
Child.doc: The model containing the tree configuration data.

Child.name: cmp:statusModel
Child.doc: The model containing the current filters.

Param.name: targetHtml
Param.Doc: An existing HTML element this widget should be attached to, provide a dom element, a jQuery element or selector, or an element id.

Param.name: contextMenu
Param.Doc: 'true' brings default context menu, 'false' no context menu and any other string is a url to a custom context menu.

Param.name: persistent
Param.Doc: 'true' brings default context menu, 'false' no context menu and any other string is a url to a custom context menu.

Api.name: docUpload
Api.Doc: Creates a docUpload front end based on given data or a configuration.

Child.name: cmp:config
Child.doc: The model containing the grid configuration data.

Param.name: scope
Param.Doc: The scope for the documents.

Param.name: instance
Param.Doc: The instance for the documents.

Param.name: addBRefs
Param.Doc: Space separated list of additional bRefs you want to load.

Param.name: onBeforeSave
Param.Doc: Function which is called before each save operation. Parameter holds current wrs dataprovider. Function needs to return true to save or false for skipping save process and resetting data.

Param.name: filterBRefs
Param.Doc: The space separated list of binding Refs that will be used in filter clause of request document.
